document_data.name: House Hawksong
document_data.mainbody: '''House Hawksong''' was a [[moon elf]] house known for its members' service to [[Evermeet]] as riders of [[eagle]]s and [[pegasus|pegasi]].
document_data.Base of operations: The Hawksong mansion was located in the city of [[Leuthilspar]] on Evermeet. It consisted of three towers connected by bridges and no one outside the house was allowed to enter, except members of the [[House Ahmaquissar|Ahmaquissar]] and [[House Nightstar|Nightstar]] houses.
document_data.History: Around [[1367 DR]], the house was led by [[Tiatha Hawksong]] who had not been seen since [[1357 DR]], but the family's official line was she was still alive during this period.
document_data.Members: * [[Tiatha Hawksong]], leader of the house in 1367 DR.
